name: Out of Fuel(v1.1.0)
description:
Out of Fuel v1.1.0

Level Design by Rodrigo Peralta

Sounds by Alvaro Morales
Music by InKid
-Youtube

Newgrounds Version

Please give me feedback

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GOAL: Complete the 15 levels, touching the Pink Zone, before you run Out of Fuel.

CONTROLS(KEYBOARD)
Space: Impulse

Left or Right Arrow: Rotate

X: Shoot

CONTROLS(GAMEPAD)

A: Impulse

Left Stick: Rotate

RB: Shoot

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
